title: Competitive Ranked Team - LFM Bronze 3+
body:
Making my own Competitive Ranked 5s team.

**Requirements:**

No Mids (I'm taking it)
Competitive
Dedicated
Decent Microphone ("wtf was there a dinosaur in his background")
Plays with earphones/headphones/headset (background echo fucks everyone else over)
Availability (More days and times is better)(GMT+10)
18+
Silver 5+ (Lower ranks might have a shot).

**Post this shit below**

IGN:
Roles (highest preference):
Can you accept non preferred roles:
Availability:
Age:
Rank:

**Example**

IGN: Lexhanatin
Roles (highest preference): Mid, Adc, Jungle
Can you accept non preferred roles: Yes
Availability: Tuesday after 2 PM, Thursday Friday Saturday Sunday any time
Age: 18
Rank: Silver 5

replies.body:
IGN: Kyle James
Roles (highest preference): support,adc 
Can you accept non preferred roles: yes
Availability: most of the time
Age: 18
Rank:s4

IGN: vSkylar
Roles (highest preference): ADC - Mid - Support - Jungle - Top
Can you accept non preferred roles: Yes (Adc best - top worst)
Availability: All day every day baby.
Age:18
Rank:Silver 2. Gold 1 before reset. 8)
How competitive are you planning to be.
I want to play ranked 5s every day but that might not be possible. Other matches might include scrims, ladders, and tournaments.
how competitive can you be with a team of silvers?
